text: We may share your information with third-party service providers who assist us in providing and improving our Service.

We may access and collect information from your calendar and email accounts to provide features such as scheduling meetings, generating summaries, and analyzing your engagement.
We may share your information with third-party service providers who assist us in providing and improving our Service.
We may use your information to personalize your experience, such as providing tailored recommendations and content.

We use cookies to help you navigate efficiently and perform certain functions.
We value your privacy

We use cookies to enhance your browsing experience, serve personalized ads or content, and analyze our traffic.
We use the information we collect to provide, maintain, and improve our Service, including developing new features and functionality.
Our Service may automatically transcribe and analyze meetings that you schedule and attend using our platform.
Salescaling retains personal data for as long as is necessary to fulfill the purposes for which it was collected.

This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, disclose, and protect your personal information when you use our platform.
We may collect personal information that you provide when you register for an account, use our Service, or communicate with us.
